          Fav. Mounts

            Fav. Minions

              My Favorite Is The Maine Coon

              They're massive! Their fur is incredibly fluffy
              They have high social needs
              They can be affected with heterochromia
              Males can weigh upwards of 12 pounds, often more.
              Their fur can be a a range of colors and patterns, including:
              • Tabby, Smoke, Shaded
              • Tortiseshell, Golden
              • White, Black, Red, Cream
              • Bicolor, Tricolor/Calico
              • Silver, Bluecream
              Their fur can shed quite a bit!
              In addition to heterochromia, they can have Copper, Green, and Golden eyes
              Their average lifespan is 9-13 years.

              • Adopt

              • Maine Rescue

              • Rescue

              • MC Adopt

              • Adopt A Cat

              From Cat Facts Testing
